meanings.definition: A person who advocates for a cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: The proponent of the new recycling program spoke passionately at the town meeting.
meanings.sent2: She is a strong proponent of renewable energy sources.
meanings.sent3: The proponent of eating ice cream for breakfast made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: As a proponent of peace, he always sought diplomatic solutions.
meanings.sent5: The proponent's unwavering dedication to the cause inspired many others to join.

meanings.definition: One who supports or argues in favor of something.
meanings.sent1: The proponent of the bill presented compelling arguments to sway the committee.
meanings.sent2: He has been a loyal proponent of the local farmers' market for years.
meanings.sent3: The proponent of napping at work had everyone nodding in agreement.
meanings.sent4: She was a proponent of the idea that music can heal the soul.
meanings.sent5: The proponent's unwavering support never wavered, even in the face of adversity.
